abstracts.cdata!:
The project would assist in the
            reorganization of the water supply and sewerage sector in
            the State of Uttar Pradesh, the construction of water supply
            schemes in selected rural areas suffering from hardship due
            to inadequate water supply, and the improvement of water
            supply and sewage systems in the five largest cities of the
            State ("the KAVAL towns").
